file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-27-19-04 - CONFIG-2 - CLASS CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CLASS CURTAIN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the class curtains. B. The class curtain is installed in zones 243 and 244. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGU- 25-27-19-000-801-A CLASS CURTAIN - REMOVAL RATION AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGU- 25-27-19-400-801-A CLASS CURTAIN - INSTALLATION RATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-2 25-27-19 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-19-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION 2. CLASS CURTAIN - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the class curtain. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-004-A (1) Loosen the screw (1) and remove the end cap (2) from the track (3). Refer to DET. D. (2) Remove the class curtain (4) from the track (3). Refer to DET. D. (3) Install the gap cover (5) to the ceiling panel. Refer to DET. E. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-19 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION Class Curtain - Removal/Installation Figure 401 C A ZONES 243 244 B DET. A D E CLASS CURTAIN DET. B DET. C CEILING PANEL (REF.) CEILING PANEL (REF.) 3. TRACK 2. END CAP 1. SCREW 5. GAP COVER 4. CURTAIN DET. E EM145AMM253108A.DGN DET. D EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-19 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-27-19-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH VIP-A AND VIP-B CONFIGURATION 3. CLASS CURTAIN - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the class curtain. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-004-A (1) Remove the gap cover (5) from the ceiling panel. Refer to DET. E. (2) Install the class curtain (4) to the track (3). Refer to DET. D. (3) Install the end cap (2) to the track (3) with the screw (1). Refer to DET. D. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-2 25-27-19 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
